mapper.select: select goods.id,goods.name,goods.price,goods.goodsType, img.path from goods join img on img.refer_id= goods.id;
select goods.name,goods.price,colorType,goods.id, brand.name as brandName from goods join brand on brand.id = goods.brand_id where goods.id = #{goods.id}

with ProductCounts as ( select goods.id as goodsId, goods.name, goods.price, goods.colorType, COUNT(cart.goods_id) as totalCount from cart join goods ON goods.id = cart.goods_id where cart.username = #{username} group by goods.id, goods.name, goods.price, goods.colorType ) select pc.name, pc.price, pc.colorType, pc.goodsId, MIN(cart.id) as cartsId, MIN(img.path) as path, pc.totalCount as count from ProductCounts pc join cart ON cart.goods_id = pc.goodsId join img ON img.refer_id = pc.goodsId where cart.username = #{username} group by pc.name, pc.price, pc.colorType, pc.goodsId, pc.totalCount;
